name: df-fm
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cfm, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cmpt(s2, cfv(cfbas, cdm(cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), cfg, crn(cmpt(s3, cv(s2), cima(cv(s1), cv(s3))))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ FilMap =(s0 ∈ 𝕌, s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(s2 ∈(fBas ` dom(s1))↦(s0[filGen]ran((s3 ∈ s2 ↦(s1 " s3))))))
comment: Define a function that takes a filter to a neighborhood filter of the range. (Since we now allow filter bases to have support smaller than the base set, the function has to come first to ensure that curryings are sets.) (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 5-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 20-Jul-2015.)
